docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Steven L. Beshear of Kentucky defended his expansion of Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act, imploring the governor-elect to keep the program.

headline.main: Kentucky Governor Issues Parting Plea to Successor on Health Care System
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Governor Issues Parting Plea to Successor on Health Care System

docs.abstract: Kentucky Gov Steven L Beshear of Kentucky vigorously defends his expansion of state's Medicaid offerings under Affordable Care Act, urging Republican governor elect Matt Bevin to keep program in place; argues decision holds up from business standpoint as well as human standpoint; Bevin previously indicated he would roll back program but has come to suggest he may seek federal permission to reshape it instead.
docs.snippet: Gov. Steven L. Beshear of Kentucky defended his expansion of Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act, imploring the governor-elect to keep the program.

docs.lead_paragraph: The dispute between Irmat and the pharmacy benefit manager OptumRx is part of a recent flurry of attention being paid to the way name-brand pharmaceuticals are marketed.

headline.main: Irmat, a Mail-Order Pharmacy, Sues OptumRx in Latest Drug-Price Skirmish
headline.print_headline: Mail-Order Pharmacy, Cut Off by a Benefit Manager, Files Suit

docs.abstract: Mail order pharmacy Irmat Pharmacy of Manhattan, cut off by benefit manager OptumRx, files suit against company; is latest skirmish in intensifying battle over drug prices, as mail order pharmacies attempt to protect their brand name products from cheaper generics.
docs.snippet: The dispute between Irmat and the pharmacy benefit manager OptumRx is part of a recent flurry of attention being paid to the way name-brand pharmaceuticals are marketed.

docs.lead_paragraph: Medicare spending on breakthrough medications for hepatitis C will nearly double this year, passing $9 billion, according to new government figures. That's raising insurance costs for all beneficiaries, whether or not they have the liver-wasting viral disease.

headline.main: What Happens to Childhood When You Start Counting Steps?

docs.abstract: A fitness tracker may seem like a cool electronic toy, but something changes when you start counting the steps, skips and hops of childhood.

headline.main: Samsung and the South Korean Success Story
